help-file.title: "SOCIAL ACTIONS" "SOCIALS"
help-file.content:
Commands mainly for social interaction:
ack, afk, agree, amaze, apologize, applaud, arch, ayt, bang, bark, bathe, bbl, beer, beg, bird, bite, bleed, blink, blow, blush, boggle, bonk, bored, bounce, bow, brb, burp, bye, cackle, calm, caress, censor, cheek, cheer, choke, chuckle, clap, comb, comfort, congratulate, cough, cringe, cry, cuddle, curious, curse, curtsey, dance, dream, drool, dropkick, duck, duh, embrace, envy, eyebrow, fart, fidget, flame, flash, flex, flip, flirt, flutter, fondle, fool, french, frown, full, fume, fuzzy, gag, gape, gasp, giggle, glare, grin, groan, grope, grovel, growl, grumble, grunt, hand, happy, hero, hiccup, hiss, hi5, holdon, hop, hug, hum, hunger, imitate, impale, insult, introduce, jam, jk, jump, kiss, kneel, laugh, lag, lean, lick, love, lost, lucky, massage, melt, moan, moon, mosh, mourn, mutter, nap, nibble, nod, nog, noogie, nose, nudge, nuzzle, ogle, panic, pant, pat, peer, pet, pillow, pinch, plonk, point, poke, ponder, pose, pounce, pout, protect, pucker, puke, pull, punch, purr, push, puzzle, raise, ready, roar, rofl, roll, rose, rub, ruffle, salute, scare, scold, scratch, scream, seduce, shake, shiver, shove, shrug, shudder, shush, sigh, sing, skip, slap, slobber, smell, smile, smirk, smoke, snap, snarl, sneer, sneeze, snicker, sniff, snoogie, snore, snort, snuggle, spam, spank, spin, spit, squeeze, squirm, stare, steam, stomp, strangle, stretch, strut, sulk, swat, sweat, sweep, tackle, tango, tap, tarzan, taunt, tease, thank, think, thirst, throw, tickle, tip, tiptoe, tongue, toss, touch, trip, tug, tweak, twibble, twiddle, twirl, undress, veto, wait, wave, welcome, wet, whap, whatever, wheeze, whimper, whine, whistle, wiggle, wince, wink, woops, worship, yawn, yodel, zone
Typing "commands socials" will generate a complete, up-to-date list of social commands.
